betterquesting:10.desc:8:
One Essentia you're having a hard time gathering is Auram. You've gotten some from Ethereal Essence, which is dropped by the flying balls of light that rarely show up in the Nether, but you'd rather not go hunting for large supplies.

Returning to your garden once more you've made a new addition to it. When a full moon is visible overhead Aurelia flowers will open up their petals, presumably to feed off of the light. Significant for you is that they will occasionally shed these petals, which can be collected off the ground as a dense source of Auram Essentia.

You should make sure the ground near the flower is level and clear, so you'll be able to collect the petals later. The flower itself is simply planted on grass, not farmland, so no need to have a water source nearby either.

Â§3Terra Wart is also a growable source of Auram Essentia. It has a quest in the Fishing, Farming, Cooking quest tab.
